revive.name: Revive Seed
revive.description: Use this on your fallen brethren to revive them.

small-heal.name: Small Healing Seed
small-heal.description: Heals your parrots a whopping 15 hit points!

large-heal.name: Large Healing Seed
large-heal.description: Heals your parrots 40 by 40 hit points! And gives them a nice after battle snack :D

mega-heal.name: Mega Healing Seed
mega-heal.description: Heals your parrots by 100 hit points! In the world of liquor this is top shelf quality.

larger-battle-team.name: Put your bag through SCP-914 and get an extra pocket. Approved by Pockets the Rogue.

upgrade-parrot.name: Upgrade A Parrot
upgrade-parrot.description: Put a parrot through SCP-914 on fine and get a better parrot! SCP-914 rolls a d20 to upgrade.

upgrade-all-battle-parrots.Name: Upgrade All Parrots
upgrade-all-battle-parrots.description: Shove your entire bag of parrots into SCP-914 slap the dial to FINE and turn that key like a car ignition. Get an entire team of upgraded parrots.

attack-buff.name: Attack Buff Powder
attack-buff.description: Puts your parrot into a drug induced rage. Make sure to check him for nose bleeds

large-attack-buff.name: Large Attack Buff Powder
large-attack-buff.description: Give your parrot this stuff if you want him to literally eat Amin.

large-defence-buff.name: Large Defence Buff Powder
large-defence-buff.description: Turns your parrot into Dwayne The Rock Johnson. For a couple turns.

mysterious-egg.name: Mysterious Egg
mysterious-egg.description: Mysteriosuly Mysterious... As well as gold and shiny!

mysterious-feather.name: Mysterious Feather
mysterious-feather.description: Mysteriously Mysterious with a hint of mystery... As well as color changing and soft!
